thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Au Trocadero - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Friendly Staff & Great Location!
thread.title_full: Friendly Staff & Great Location! - Review of BEST WESTERN Au Trocadero, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ADND1
title: Friendly Staff & Great Location!
text:
First for business then for an extended holiday, I stayed here with my husband for five nights and had an amazing time.
If the Eiffel is the driving force for your trip to Paris, then the Trocadéro circle will be a good place to stay. And The Best Western Au trocadéro is probably the best bet when it comes to location. The metro station is 10 metres from the hotel, with options of the bus nearby aswell. If u ask for a room with a view (the 4&5th floors) you'l probably get the view of the eiffel. And can clock the hourly twinkling of the tower lights.
Eventhough rooms are small (which is the case for most places in europe) the bathrooms are spacious and well equipped including heating rods for wet clothes. Clean white linen on the bed and black and white photographs of the city adorn the walls in a neat fashion.
The staff is very friendly and helpful- always giving you a ready grin (which may not be the case in paris)!
They also have a good spread for breakfast and busy and famous cafes around the hotel.
